summary: What? you hate that bard Mikeal too? so do I so, let's turn him into a dragon!
descriptionHtml:
What? You hate that bard Mikeal? So do I so, let's turn him into a dragon! This mod may or may not require all DLC, I don't know. Killing him still counts as murder, so no witnesses OK? That's all! Nivneb out...Â 

PS this is my first actual mod so please keep the comments to constructive feedback, and of course SOME Concerns and questions
author: Nivneb96
